Text: is this episode the series finale?
Thanks ever so much. I can not wait for E18. What a great show. FOX lost out big time by ending this great show!
Surprisingly, it wasn't FOX this time. Caprica is a SyFy show, they are the ones who cancelled it.
Syfy revealed they’ve ordered a prequel pilot called Battlestar Galactica: Blood & Chrome, which will replace Caprica next season if it gets picked up.
